My power comes from the FOREST!: Forests let him play more powerful cards.
Some cards require special lands to be played.
Forest creatures MUST be summoned on forests.
Each turn, you can make either 1 special land OR 2 neutral lands.
Abilities get explained at the TOP of the card.
Select a card to see what it does.
Creatures with Gift do something special when summoned.
Creatures next to taunting enemies MUST stay and fight.
